text: sRu#jati yaqj~jO vai kRu#ShNAjiqnaM ~Myaqj~jEnaiqva yaqj~ja(gm) sa(gm) sRu#jati ruqdrAH saqBRuMtya# pRuthiqvImityA#haiqtA vA EqtaM dEqvatAq agrEq sama#Baraqn tABi#rEqvainaq(gm)q saMBa#rati maqKasyaq SirOq&sItyA#ha yaqj~jO vai maqKastasyaiqta-cCirOq yaduqKA tasmA#dEqvamA#ha yaqj~jasya# paqdE sthaq ityA#ha yaqj~jasyaq hyE#tE - [  ] 33
